name: EnchantedIndustries
title: Enchanted Industries & Chemicals
author: Enchant3d
description: Adds new ores such as nickel, aluminum, chromium and shale. Makes light oil more useful. Adds new ways to get electricity like new boilers and osmosis. Adds new ways to get plastics, batteries and sulfur. Changes oil processing. Requires Enchanted Electronics and Enchanted Nuclear.
